narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This first pre-license inspection for a Class "A" license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
Micro-chipping as a method of identification has been approved.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The appropriate license fee must be sent to the following address:
2150 Centre Ave.
Building B, MS 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
